TextView.android:text:
* E-Voting application runs on Android platform.
 * Go to Vote option and select Proceed to vote option if your number is registered. * Or select Login as a camp Administrator if you are valid camp volunteer.
 * It will redirect you to scanning screen.
 * Scan the QR code on Aadhaar card. * OTP will be sent on your registered phone number.
* Enter the OTP. 
* Select the candidate whom you desire to vote. * Confirm the vote.
* For knowing the result, enter your zone name and get the result
* This application replaces the conventional voting system. * Vote from anywhere to the candidate of your zone.
